short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension detects phone numbers on web pages and enables click to dial via Sangoma CX Agent Panel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome Extension detects phone numbers on web pages and enables them as links so when clicked will place the call via Sangoma CX Agent Panel.

You must have Sangoma CX Standard, Advanced or Premium service to use this browser extension.

The extension configuration manual is available at https://sangomakb.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SCX/pages/55775431/Sangoma+CX+Click+to+Dial+Chrome+Extension+Guide
